channel.title: Github FieldDay on Open Source Ascol Circle
channel.description: Recent content in Github FieldDay on Open Source Ascol Circle

item.title: Github Essentials
item.description: OSAC successfully conducted its first event under Introducing Communities “Github Essentials”. This event focused on essential Github topics such as the Github Field Day, Github Community, and the Github Developer Pack. The session provided an in-depth understanding of these initiatives. Our speaker, Yunika Bajracharya being one of Github Campus Expert , provided detailed tips and insights, sharing her expertise on the steps and strategies required to required to get into these things.
